eventParts.text: Hey, is something the matter, Alex?
Ugh, yeah. My favorite socks have a hole in them. Look!
Well, we have traveled many miles by now. No wonder they’ve gotten torn.
Here, let me see. Maybe I can mend them.
Of course! Before all of this, I used to work at a tailor. I mended things like this all the time.
Oh. I didn’t realize that’s what you used to do. I’m sorry I never asked.
It’s okay. I don’t want to brag.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Telling us what you do for a living isn’t bragging, Kim! It’s fun to hear about what you used to do before this adventure started.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Oh, thank you! I know a bit about knitting and mending socks, but my favorite thing to do is embroidery. I embroidered a jacket meant for the queen once!

Kim gains +2 social!

eventConsequence.selectionText: You don’t have to talk about it if you don’t want to, Kim, but it’s not bragging if you do. But if you just want to show us by doing instead, that’s cool too.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Oh, okay. Yeah, I think I’ll just show you. 

Kim gains +2 solitude!
